articles.title: “Unusually Massive” – Astronomers Discover a Planet That Shouldn't Exist - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Researchers at Penn State have discovered an unusually massive planet, LHS 3154b, orbiting an ultracool dwarf star. This finding, contradicting current theories, prompts a reassessment of star and planet formation processes. The discovery of a planet that is …
articles.content: Penn State researchers have discovered an extraordinarily massive planet orbiting an ultracool dwarf star, challenging existing theories of planet and star formation. Named LHS 3154b, the planet’s ma… [+8374 chars]

articles.title: A detailed look at the OnePlus 12 ahead of its global launch - The Verge
articles.description: OnePlus has launched the OnePlus 12 in China. It comes with up to 50W wireless charging, 24GB of RAM, 100W fast wired charging, and triple rear cameras.

articles.title: Meta is removing the ability to see phone notifications on your Quest - The Verge
articles.description: With the Meta Quest v60 update, the company is discontinuing a feature that lets you see notifications from your iOS or Android smartphone while you’re using a Quest headset.

articles.title: The evolution of human altriciality and brain development in comparative context - Nature.com
articles.description: Humans have the highest evolutionary rate towards becoming more altricial across all placental mammals, but this results primarily from postnatal enlargement of brain size rather than neonatal changes.
